title: Star Guardian Lulu is still missing animation
body:
Star Guardian Lulu still seems to be missing her second running animation. According to the patch notes, the animation was supposed to be fixed for all skins. 

I checked the other skins and the second animation has returned. However, now they are triggered by a movement increasing effect instead of a threshold. I'm not sure that was intended.

Thanks!

replies.body: The run animation for star guardian lulu is still missing is this going to be fixed? thanks

Hi Pichu! 

Thanks for the report! There were complications in having both the homeguard and running animation working properly for this skin. We'll get a designer and an animator to take a look at this again and see if we can get a solve for this. :)

I was so happy when I saw that they corrected that bug but they messed up.

They put her running animation as her homeguards animation on her other skins. :(
